CustomField.description: The order of the status picklist item. Used to compare if the user progresses in the process or not. (Example: New = 1, Qualification = 2, Converted = 3).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The order of the status picklist item. Used to compare if the user progresses in the process or not. (Example: New = 1, Qualification = 2, Converted = 3).
CustomField.label: Order
